summary: sure, pokken for the switch and ultra sun and ultra moon are cool announcements and all, but i'm personally the most excited for...
body: sure, pokken for the switch and ultra sun and ultra moon are cool announcements and all, but i’m personally the most excited for gold and silver on virtual console because Johto is the most mysterious to me and because of steelix, umbreon, the legendary dogs, totodile cyndiquil and chicorita (in that order), and the mareep line.

reblog.comment: sure, pokken for the switch and ultra sun and ultra moon are cool announcements and all, but i’m personally the most excited for gold and silver on virtual console because Johto is the most mysterious to me and because of steelix, umbreon, the legendary dogs, totodile cyndiquil and chicorita (in that order), and the mareep line.

trail.content_raw: sure, pokken for the switch and ultra sun and ultra moon are cool announcements and all, but i’m personally the most excited for gold and silver on virtual console because Johto is the most mysterious to me and because of steelix, umbreon, the legendary dogs, totodile cyndiquil and chicorita (in that order), and the mareep line.
trail.content: sure, pokken for the switch and ultra sun and ultra moon are cool announcements and all, but i’m personally the most excited for gold and silver on virtual console because Johto is the most mysterious to me and because of steelix, umbreon, the legendary dogs, totodile cyndiquil and chicorita (in that order), and the mareep line.

summary: Pokémon Direct: annunciati Pokémon Oro e Pokémon Argento per la Virtual Console di Nintendo 3DS
title: Pokémon Direct: annunciati Pokémon Oro e Pokémon Argento per la Virtual Console di Nintendo 3DS
body:
Pokémon Direct: annunciati Pokémon Oro e Pokémon Argento per la Virtual Console di Nintendo 3DS

A settembre anche la seconda generazione dei Pokémon arriverà su Nintendo 3DS tramite la Virtual Console. Annunciati Pokémon Oro e Pokémon Argento.

Nel corso del Pokémon Direct tenutosi ieri, oltre all’annuncio di Pokémon Ultrasole e Pokémon Ultraluna, The Pokémon Company ha annunciato l’arrivo di Pokémon Oro e Pokémon Argento sulla Virtual Console di Nintendo 3DS. (more…)

View On WordPress

tags: we might get new alolan forms!!
summary:
So the salt begins… 
I’m seeing so many people getting upset over pokemon direct today and I want to remind everyone just...
caption:
So the salt begins…
I’m seeing so many people getting upset over pokemon direct today and I want to remind everyone just because it wasn’t announced doesn’t mean Sinnoh remakes are NEVER gonna happen.

Besides, I think there’s a lot of potential for ultra sun and ultra moon? We really only saw like 4 seconds of footage so maybe as more information is leaked it’ll surprise some people!

reblog.comment:

summary: Pokkén Tournament DX llega al Nintendo Switch el 22 de septiembre
title: Pokkén Tournament DX llega al Nintendo Switch el 22 de septiembre
body:
#PokkénTournamentDX llega al #Switch Sept.22 con #PokémonGold #PokémonSilver #3DS. #Pokémon #UltraSun UltraMoon Nov.17

Durante la transmisión Pokémon Direct de esta mañana, The Pokémon Company anunció que Pokkén Tournament DX llegará al Nintendo Switch el 22 de septiembre.

La versión remasterizada del juego Wii U de lucha Pokémon, que será el primer título de Pokémon para Switch, contará con cinco nuevos combatientes jugables, al igual que combates oficiales, combates amistosos, y combates de grupos. Por primera…

summary: But real talk though, Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon not being announced for the Nintendo Switch is a huge missed opportunity....
body:
But real talk though, Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon not being announced for the Nintendo Switch is a huge missed opportunity. The home/portable hybrid console thing the Switch has going is perfect for Pokémon. I can understand that Pokémon hasn’t had a huge home console release as the whole thing about Pokémon is going out to trade and battle with your friends. But the Switch is portable, making that a non-issue. Plus docking the console would allow home users to have a full 1080p Pokémon experience.

I’m still going to play Ultra Sun and Moon, but I’m disappointed that they won’t be on the Switch.

I’m still going to play Ultra Sun and Moon, but I’m disappointed that they won’t be on the Switch.

But the Switch is portable, making that a non-issue. Plus docking the console would allow home users to have a full 1080p Pokémon experience.

I’m still going to play Ultra Sun and Moon, but I’m disappointed that they won’t be on the Switch.

The home/portable hybrid console thing the Switch has going is perfect for Pokémon. I can understand that Pokémon hasn’t had a huge home console release as the whole thing about Pokémon is going out to trade and battle with your friends. But the Switch is portable, making that a non-issue. Plus docking the console would allow home users to have a full 1080p Pokémon experience.

I’m still going to play Ultra Sun and Moon, but I’m disappointed that they won’t be on the Switch.

tags: Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon
summary: Pokémon Ultra? An alternate story?
title: Pokémon Ultra? An alternate story?
body:
There may be no Sinnoh remake but there might be influence. When I heard alternate story-line, I thought of time and space. Time and space. Dialga and Palkia. Is it going to the realm of parallel universe? Too much for my mind to handle.

They named it Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon after the Ultra Beast but why called it an alternate story? No Sinnoh remake but Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon are alternate timeline. Huh… I’ll stop before I get a headache with multiverse in my mind.

reblog.comment:

summary: Pokémon Ultra Sun/Moon
title: Pokémon Ultra Sun/Moon
body:
An alternate story with new Pokémon? I’m a little wary since Sun and Moon released not too long ago but at the same time, when have I ever turned down a new Pokémon game. (Except maybe pokken tournament but I have my reasons for now.)

Can’t say I’m too bummed about the lack of Sinnoh remakes. Never could get into Sinnoh’s story. But, they’ve remade all the others, their time will come soon. Hang in there, Sinnoh fans.

summary: Why Pokemon Direct Why?
title: Why Pokemon Direct Why?
body: Because… Pokkén Tournament DX for Nintendo Switch and Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon are Finally Here. That’s what we are talking to Isabella the Bugerigar about a New Pokémon Games. Next Month. we are Getting Pokémon Ultra Moon. 2 New Gen VII Games are Existed in 2017. WHY DID IT HAPPEN. WHY DID IT HAPPEN!!!!! After I Watched Pokémon Direct on Youtube. Oh Well. I’m going to Vacation on Mackinac Island on June 9!
